name: AlpineAire Black Bart Chili With Beef & Beans
categories: Black Bart Chili With Beef& Beans
description: End the day with a hot meal of black beans, kidney beans and beef with a spirited classic chili taste reminiscent of the Wild West.Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add.Ingredients: pinto beans, black beans, beef diced cooked freeze dried (beef, salt), tomato powder, potato starch, Monterey chili powder (chili pepper, spices, salt, garlic), sea salt, tomato flakes, bell pepper red & green combo, white onion, garlic granulated, cumin, jalapeno, basil, oregano.No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy.Meals have a 5-year shelf life.
